description.value:
Eldar Rune often used by Farseers. Enemy Psykers within Perception Characteristic Metres add +10 to rolls on Psychic Phenomena and Perils of the Warp Tables.

Requirements

Xenotech. Not something a character would normally be able to acquire.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
description.summary: Eldar Rune often used by Farseers. Enemy Psykers within Perception Characteristic Metres add +10 to rolls on Psychic Phenomena and Perils of the Warp Tables.

system.effect: Eldar Rune often used by Farseers. Enemy Psykers within Perception Characteristic Metres add +10 to rolls on Psychic Phenomena and Perils of the Warp Tables.
